programme.title: Flip or Flop

programme.title: Home Town: Takeover

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer

programme.desc: Every murder is a tragedy but some are plain barbaric.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: An out-of-control home makeover may have led to murder.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: In 1969 race riots in York, PA, claim two lives - an African-American mother of two and a young, white police officer. Their deaths are largely forgotten until 30 years later, when their cold cases are reopened, revealing the city's dark past.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These Deadly Women sacrificed their loved ones to satisfy their 'Love of Money.

programme.title: The Shadows of Death
programme.desc: Doris Bradley moved her family to idyllic small town Spring Valley, Illinois, to escape the violence of Chicago. When her 16-year-old daughter Diamond disappears, she fears the worst, and police uncover secrets that may have cost her her life.

programme.title: The Shadows of Death
programme.desc: When mother of three Christine Sheddy vanishes without a trace, police are sure she left of her own volition. But her mother, Lynn, knows Christine would never abandon her children.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: 19-year-old Angel Garcia disappears after riding his dirt bike around Hartford CT. Friends say Angel was chased by a mysterious SUV before he disappeared. Months Later, a possible sighting in a convenience store 15 miles from home.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Stephanie Crane, aged 9, walks home from the local bowling alley-but never arrives. Early leads go nowhere. For years authorities don't find her or make an arrest. Now, they hope that advances in evidence testing may finally solve the mystery.

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: When a young girl is found murdered in Caledonia NY, police struggle to identify her. The tragedy leads the town make her one of their own, with the name Cali-Doe.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Claire Throssell meets Darren Sykes, she thinks her future husband's overwhelming displays of affection are signs of love. She fails to see that Darren is out to control her, and if he doesn't get his way, the revenge he takes will be terrible.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In Buena Park, California, a suitcase containing a mutilated body is discovered in a dumpster. The victim is identified as Jasmine Fiore, a 28-year-old model who has been reported missing. Police turn to surveillance video, hoping to identify her killer.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: David Weedman is everyone's friend in Tell City, Indiana. When he's found dead at home, suspicions of suicide emerge. His family pressures detectives to investigate further and now David's best friends are murder suspects.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A couple moves into their dream home on the same street where they've lived for years, only to find themselves engulfed in a wrenching conflict with their neighbour who believes he's the rightful owner of their property.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: Differences over how to enjoy life in a peaceful, rural neighborhood quickly escalate into a feud that comes to a bloody end on the road where it began.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A family loves everything about their new home except the mockingbirds that perch and squawk in the backyard lemon tree. Their efforts to scare them off start a feud with their neighbors that spins out of control until one of them lies dead.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: A couple escapes the hazards of the big city and moves to a country community. But suspicion that their new neighbors are in the drug trade turns into bloody rage with children in caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When popular teacher Simeonette Mapes-Crupi is found dead in her Staten Island condo, all evidence points to a brutal robbery gone wrong. But as detectives dig deeper, they uncover a wealth of secrets, lies and sins, that leads to the ultimate betrayal.

programme.title: Devil Among Us
programme.desc: A sniper shooting on an Alaskan highway leaves a young man dead and a community running scared. As one family grieves, another becomes hell-bent on revenge as they formulate an audacious plot.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: Air Force veteran Michael Giles disappears along with his savings of $206,000. Detectives discover a woman named Kwaneta Harris has been draining the man's accounts. But as they dig deeper, detectives uncover a massive conspiracy of greed and murder.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: In Montrose, Colorado, rock quarry owner and mother, Irene Trujillo, suddenly goes missing. When her daughter's search for their mom comes up empty, 911 is called. Those closest to Irene, including her employees, are suspected of foul play.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: When twentysomething Patricia Richmond is found tied up, and murdered in her future in-laws' home, the resort town of Steamboat Springs, Colorado is at a loss.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Bubbly college student and waitress, Mindy Morgenstern, is found strangled and stabbed in her own apartment. Family, friends, and the entire town of Valley City, North Dakota help law enforcement identify who could have committed this violent crime.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: What starts as an idyllic relationship between neighbouring best friends and business partners takes a wrong turn and ends up in threats, restraining orders, litigation, and ultimately a triple homicide.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: Christmas will never be the same for the two local residents of Noble, Oklahoma whose dog drops a human skull onto their front porch. After six years and no leads, the police must navigate the twists and turns of the victim's past to find redemption.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: A man is hysterical when he finds his brother's girlfriend and roommate beaten with an iron and stabbed to death on the floor. The brothers appear devastated, but the discovery of her missing phone casts doubt on their alibis.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: After an early retirement, a man buys a duplex and rents half of it out to a troubled family. With the help of his gun, he sends an abusive husband packing and sets his sights on the wife.

programme.title: Murder in the Heartland
programme.desc: When Marty finds his big brother Mike Rust's home in disarray with a motorcycle missing, the Saguache, Colorado, community leaves no stone unturned searching for one of their own. The case goes cold as years pass, but the local rumor mill heats up.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Costa Mesa, California is beautiful place to live, but it comes at a cost. The murder of a young girl and the disappearance of a former Army solider leads investigators down a dark path into the mind of an unassuming killer.

programme.title: Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Police looking into the murders of a married team of sun-drenched Southern California entrepreneurs investigate whether the couple may have found out the hard way that no amount of money is worth losing sleep or your life over.

programme.title: Torn From the Headlines: New York Post Reports
programme.desc: When a prominent businessman is kidnapped from a diner parking lot for a multimillion dollar ransom, the NYPD races against the clock to find him alive. Meanwhile, a New York Post reporter uncovers a career making scoop- that could come at a fatal price.

programme.title: Torn From the Headlines: New York Post Reports

programme.desc: New discoveries reveal the scandals and secrets of Nero and his lost palace. Using cutting-edge technology, experts may confirm if the infamous emperor burned down Rome so his could build his golden wonder.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: Egypt's Black Pyramid is the strange, crumbling pyramid that collapsed before its pharaoh was ever buried here, and today, it's largely unexplored. Special access to a hi-tech archaeological investigation reveals what went so catastrophically wrong.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: The Leaning Tower of Pisa is one of the world's most iconic buildings, and it's also the site of an 800-year-old mystery; using cutting-edge tech, experts investigate the archaeological evidence to reveal when it might finally fall over.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: Go inside the Acropolis, an ancient engineering marvel that has stood above the city of Athens for thousands of years. Follow the scientists working to reveal its hidden mysteries: how it was built, what it looked like, and why it's still standing today.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: The legend of King Arthur is one of a courageous fighter and leader in battle, but for centuries, the fabled king has been a mystery to historians. Find out if his story of Camelot, Excalibur and Guinevere just an elaborate fairytale.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: The Biblical mystery of the whereabouts of the Ark of the Covenant is unravelled on a quest across continents. Believed to be the throne of God himself, the search for the Ark leads us to where many are convinced is its current resting place, Ethiopia.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: Experts investigate the fate of billions of dollars in gold and artwork that Hitler stole during World War II, and using brand-new discoveries, they might finally locate the whereabouts of the missing Nazi treasure.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: Experts investigated the Dead Sea Scrolls, which have been kept top-secret for decades by the Vatican. These could reveal the location of tunnel holding billions of dollars of treasure.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: Special access to cutting-edge archaeological investigations in the Holy Land unearth fresh evidence that reveals new secrets about the life of Moses.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: Templar fact and fiction have become blurred by their depictions in book and on film. However, we present a very different picture that challenges head on the orthodox beliefs about an order that angered much of Europe, particularly France.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: It is one of the great wonders of the ancient world, but there is little information on who built the magnificent city of Petra in Jordan and why. See what treasure remains buried there and the dark secrets that remain in this mysterious place.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: Find out what The Holy Grail could have been, whether it was a cup from the Last Supper or used to cleanse Jesus’ body after the Crucifixion, and see where it could be today.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: As the Nazis waged war for world domination, they began to develop a strange mythology of occult rites and pagan beliefs, and now, experts investigate how far the Nazis may have gone to transform their party into a new, cult-like religion.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: The Knights Templar may have discovered a great treasure in Jerusalem and brought it back to Europe to become more powerful than the Pope itself. We try to solve the mystery of why this treasure disappeared.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: Mysterious crystal skulls could be long-lost relics of Aztec and Maya civilizations that grant supernatural powers, according to some; experts investigate new leads to reveal if these strange objects are genuine artifacts or if they're modern-day fakes.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Satellite images capture what appears to be a massive river of blood flowing through the barren landscape of Siberia; experts investigate and discover a nearby industrial plant that's suspected to be one of the most polluting enterprises in history.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: A strange circular forest is found next to a notorious cannibal site. Then, when an eerie crater is spotted in Siberia, experts uncover if it could be evidence of Nikola Tesla's doomsday device.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Satellites spot a 2,000-year-old structure in Wales, that some suspect has a secret connection to King Arthur.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: Stories on this episode include desperate signs from lost veterans in Vietnam captured by satellite, a fleet of massive ships stranded in the middle of a vast desert and strange walls stretching vast distances across Northern California.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: A strange circular forest is found next to a notorious cannibal site. Then, when an eerie crater is spotted in Siberia, experts uncover if it could be evidence of Nikola Tesla's doomsday device.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: New evidence might finally identify the hiding place of Hitler's billion-dollar gold train. A discovery of a long-lost settlement rewrites the history of the Vikings in North America. A blood-red river in Siberia points to catastrophic pollution.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Find out how fibreglass boats, clothes dryers, gum and fireworks are made.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Learn how pneumatic impact wrenches, cultured marble sinks, plantain chips, and NASCAR stock cars are made.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind the making of chocolate coins, floor heating systems, pedal cars, and latex swords.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Mark Tewksbury shows viewers how some familiar objects of everyday life are made.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind pipe cleaners, blue stilton cheese, smart electric meters, and telescopes.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: This episode features aerospace fasteners, cactus pear puree, and lab reactors.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: This episode features Indy steering wheels, mixed salad, and wind turbines.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: See how automatic sliding doors, gin and firearms restoration are made.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Greek natives and their kin built the Birmingham restaurant scene, from barbecue joints to hotdog stands to steakhouses. Bright Star, founded in 1907, is the old guard and Johnny's is the new guard Greek restaurant. This is what the future looks like.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Pablo Rivadeneyra rotisserie-cooks lime-marinated chicken in Norwood. Across the street at Scott's BBQ, Larry and Betty Jean Scott work a smoke-belching pit. In these two places, we get a glimpse of the hard work that defines life in the south.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: One meat and three vegetables is the formula for a typical farmhand meal, translated in the mid-twentieth century to steam table cafes. In Nashville, the differences between Black and White cooking come into focus, and we discover that there are few.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Shreveport emerged in the mid-1800s as a lumber boomtown on the Red River. Cycles of boom and bust has defined this town. Herby K's is a 1936 vintage beer garden and fry house. Lucky Palace serves wok-fried T-bones and pork egg foo young.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: From Liuzza's and Mandina's – two Sicilian corner stores that have become neighborhood Creole Italian restaurants – look at how and why some stories get erased while others become defining narratives.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Once a Southern institution, barbecue has become an American obsession and Texas brisket has been mainstreamed. This is a story about a scrappy onetime oil boomtown, where cooks make the most of scraps, and about two Gulf Coast dishes that have hung on.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: In the southern towns of Hodgenville and Bardstown, Kentucky, the land where Lincoln was born, conflicting ideas about identity and purpose come into focus. Onion burgers and country sausage prove constants in a time of great change.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Just as there are many Souths, black Memphis reveals itself to be varied and complex and beautiful. Here, we see the streets of Memphis and its classic spots including Pop's Hot Tamales, Lee Crumb and Ms. Girlee's.

programme.desc: Get to know the good people of the south through experiencing southern food and culture.

programme.desc: Diagnosed with dementia and forced into retirement, a veteran CIA agent goes rogue when he learns that his old nemesis has turned up once again. He sets out on an intercontinental mission to take his enemy down before his illness takes over in earnest.

programme.title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: An intelligent ape named Caesar resurfaces from hiding to lead his simian brothers and sisters in a revolution against humanity.

programme.desc: A charming sociopath takes over the life of a playboy he admires in 1950s Italy.

programme.desc: An aggressive police officer forcefully recruits his uber driver to help with his work.

programme.desc: Civil rights attorney Bryan Stevenson fights for justice and works to free a wrongly convicted prisoner from death row.

programme.desc: A tough teacher inspires his East L.A. students to go on to greater achievements.

programme.desc: Eight teens play a dangerous game that has them turning up dead, one by one.

programme.title: Rounders
programme.desc: A student who vows to give up gambling is forced to play for high stakes to help a friend.

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: This film chronicles the sinking of the whaling ship Essex by an enormous whale. This event, which happened in real life, inspired author Herman Melville to write his famous novel Moby Dick.

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple agrees to have a doctor clone their recently deceased eight year-old son. Everything seems fine until their new son reaches the age at which he previously died, and strange things begin to occur.

programme.title: Hackers
programme.desc: Mischievous teenagers hack into a corporate network and stumble upon evidence of a crime.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: A woman's wealthy, abusive ex commits apparent suicide, leaving his fortune to her. However, after lethal events begin to occur around her she begins to believe she is being targeted by an unseen stalker.

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: When a millionaire discovers that his wife is having an affair, he hires her lover to kill her.

programme.title: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: A nun becomes a death row inmate's spiritual advisor as he awaits his execution.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: A man with psychic powers protects a young girl with similar abilities from a cult.

programme.title: Bully
programme.desc: Teenagers scheme to murder a friend of theirs when his bullying gets out of hand.

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A mother of two begins to suspect that the dark mansion they inhabit is actually haunted.

programme.desc: Thomas Edison and George Westinghouse compete to create the electrical system that will power the world.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: A Naval officer returning from war joins a cult which helps to clear his head.

programme.title: Eighth Grade
programme.desc: An adolescent struggles to be noticed by her peers during the final week of eighth grade despite being pretty, funny and friendly. It's a tough world for newly-minted teens, especially when YouTube views and Instagram likes are the most important things.

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: A man, who donated sperm numerous times in his youth, finds out that he has fathered 533 children. He finds ways to meet some of them, all the while facing their lawsuit demanding to know the identity of their biological father.

programme.title: Marley
programme.desc: Chronicling the life and times of Bob Marley.

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A young black man struggles to find his own place in the world while growing up in a rough neighbourhood of Miami. Faced with a troubled home life and finding his own identity, he journeys from childhood to adulthood, showing moments that shape his life.

programme.title: Welcome to the Punch
programme.desc: Ex-criminal is forced to return to London giving his nemesis one last chance to catch him.

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: After being held captive for seven years in a confined space, a woman and her young son are freed. What follows next is a hard adjustment for both of them as they integrate back into society.

programme.title: Shithouse
programme.desc: A lonely 19-year-old struggles with making friends and adjusting to life as a college freshman. However, everything changes when he attends a party at the legendary Shithouse and connects with his older, much cooler Resident Advisor.

programme.title: Waves
programme.desc: A family navigates love and forgiveness in the aftermath of a loss.

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A young black man struggles to find his own place in the world while growing up in a rough neighbourhood of Miami. Faced with a troubled home life and finding his own identity, he journeys from childhood to adulthood, showing moments that shape his life.

programme.title: Mid90s
programme.desc: Troubled 13-year-old Stevie has an unhappy home life, but when he gets a new skateboard he finds himself making new friends with a group of older boys who begin having a corrupting influence on him, worrying his single mother and older brother.

programme.title: Trespass Against Us
programme.desc: After an elaborate heist goes south, a reluctant criminal must find a way to escape from the clutches of his fierce outlaw father and the encroaching police.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A family man's life is destroyed when his one-night-stand's love for him becomes obsessive.

programme.title: Rollerball
programme.desc: In 2005, a deadly sport tests the players' skills as they face their fears on rollerblades.

programme.title: Tommy Boy
programme.desc: A young man is faced with the task of saving his father's plant and hometown economy.

programme.title: Brahms: The Boy 2
programme.desc: A young boy forms an attachment to a life-like doll after his family moves into a new home.

programme.title: The Words
programme.desc: After stealing another man's work, a writer learns the price he must pay.

programme.title: Red Joan
programme.desc: A mild-mannered and elderly British woman is arrested and accused of leaking nuclear secrets to the Soviet Union in her position as a highly placed spy decades earlier.

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: A family moves to the English countryside where life takes a twisted turn.

programme.title: Relic
programme.desc: When an elderly lady goes missing, her daughter and granddaughter travel to their country home to find her. She reappears in a disoriented state and the women fear a sinister presence is taking over.

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. At their wits ends, the FBI enlists new recruit Clarice and the help of a psychotic genius who is behind bars. In order to stop a madman, Clarice must overcome her aversion to her disturbing new partner.

programme.title: Swallow
programme.desc: A woman develops an obsession with ingesting dangerous items. A dark secret lies at the root of her behaviour, which she is forced to confront when her husband and in-laws try to gain control over her.

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: A family moves to the English countryside where life takes a twisted turn.

programme.title: The Blackcoat's Daughter
programme.desc: When two girls are left alone over winter break at their prep school, they discover an evil force is stalking them. Meanwhile, a troubled girl is trying to get to the school. As the girls struggle to survive, they learn a secret that links all of them.

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: When a girl is thought to be possessed by the Devil, a troubled priest intervenes.

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose. At their wits ends, the FBI enlists new recruit Clarice and the help of a psychotic genius who is behind bars. In order to stop a madman, Clarice must overcome her aversion to her disturbing new partner.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: A brutal serial killer resurfaces to play cat and mouse with his FBI Agent nemesis.

programme.title: It's Me, Sugar
programme.desc: A recounting of the making of "Some Like It Hot," starring Marilyn Monroe and directed by Billy Wilder.
